headache.question: How long have you been experiencing the headache?
What type of headache are you experiencing?
Do you have any other symptoms along with the headache?

fever.question: Do you know your current body temperature?
How long have you had the fever?
Do you also have chills, shivering, or body pain?

common_cold.question: Do you have a runny nose, blocked nose, or sore throat?
How long have these symptoms been present?
Are the symptoms mild, moderate, or severe?

cough.question: Is the cough dry or with mucus?
How long have you been coughing?
Is your cough mild, moderate, or severe?

flu.question: Are you experiencing body pain or fatigue?
Do you have a fever along with flu symptoms?
How long have you had flu symptoms?

body_pain.question: Which part of the body is hurting?
What is the severity of the pain on a scale of 1 to 10?

stomach_pain.question: Is the pain in the upper, middle, or lower abdomen?
Is the pain sharp, dull, or cramping?
Do you also have gas, nausea, or bloating?

acidity.question: Are you experiencing heartburn, sour burps, or chest burning?
Did you eat spicy or oily food before symptoms started?
How long have you been feeling acidity?

diarrhea.question: How many times have you passed loose stools today?
Are you feeling thirsty, dizzy, or weak?
Did you eat anything unusual before symptoms started?

constipation.question: How long have you been experiencing difficulty passing stool?
Is the stool hard, dry, or pellet-like?
Are you drinking enough water and eating fiber-rich foods?

options.text: No, low water and fiber intake

vomiting.question: How many times have you vomited today?
Did vomiting start after eating something?

food_poisoning.question: Did symptoms start after eating outside food?
Do you also have loose motions?

dehydration.question: Are you feeling intense thirst or dryness in the mouth?
Do you feel weak or dizzy?

allergy.question: Do you know what triggered the allergy (dust, food, pollen)?
Are you experiencing sneezing, itching, or rash?
When did the allergy symptoms begin?

skin_rash.question: Is the rash red, itchy, or swollen?

acne.question: Are the pimples red, whiteheads, or cystic acne?
How long have you had acne?

toothache.question: Is the pain in a specific tooth or the entire jaw?
How severe is the tooth pain?
Do you have swelling or sensitivity to hot/cold?

eye_irritation.question: Are your eyes red, itchy, or watery?
Did irritation start after dust exposure or screen use?
How long have your eyes been irritated?

ear_pain.question: Is the pain in one ear or both?
Do you have discharge, fever, or hearing difficulty?
How long have you had ear pain?

sore_throat.question: Do you have dry throat, cough, or phlegm?
How long have you had throat discomfort?

back_pain.question: Is the pain in upper, middle, or lower back?
Is the pain sharp or dull?
Did the pain start after lifting heavy items or sitting long?

neck_pain.question: Do you have stiffness in the neck?
Does the pain increase when moving the neck?
How long have you had neck pain?

shoulder_pain.question: Is the pain sharp, burning, or dull?
Since when are you feeling shoulder pain?

knee_pain.question: Is the pain in the front, back, or sides of the knee?
Does pain increase when walking or bending?
How long have you been experiencing knee pain?

muscle_strain.question: Did the strain occur after exercise or lifting heavy objects?
Is the pain mild, moderate, or severe?

burn_injury.question: Was the burn caused by hot water, flame, or something else?
Which area of the skin is burned?
Is the burn mild, blistered, or peeling?

wound.question: Is it a cut, scratch, or deep wound?

sprain.question: Which area is sprained (ankle, wrist, etc.)?

dizziness.question: Do you feel spinning or light-headed?
Does it happen while standing or moving?
How long does the dizziness last?

hypertension.question: Do you know your recent blood pressure reading?
Are you experiencing headache or breathlessness?
How long have your BP symptoms been present?

low_blood_pressure.question: Do you feel weak, dizzy, or light-headed?
Do you know your BP reading?
Did this start after stress, fasting, or dehydration?

period_pain.question: Is the pain mild, moderate, or severe?
Is the pain in the lower abdomen or lower back?
How long do your cramps usually last?

urine_infection.question: Do you experience burning or pain while urinating?
Do you feel the urge to urinate frequently?
Is your urine cloudy or dark?

itching.question: Where do you feel the itching?
How long have you been experiencing itching?
Did it start after using new soap, clothing, or food?

insomnia.question: Do you have trouble falling asleep or staying asleep?
How many hours do you sleep per night?
Are you currently stressed or anxious?

stress.question: Do you know the cause of your stress?
Are you experiencing headaches or sleep difficulty?
How long have you been feeling stressed?

anxiety.question: Do you experience nervousness, sweating, or rapid heartbeat?
Do certain situations trigger your anxiety?
How long have you been feeling anxious?

sunstroke.question: Were you exposed to direct sunlight for long durations?
Are you experiencing dizziness or headache?
Have you been drinking enough water?

cold_sores.question: Are the sores on your lips or inside the mouth?
Is there pain or burning sensation?
How long have you had the cold sores?

motion_sickness.question: Do you feel nausea or dizziness during travel?
Does this happen in car, bus, or train?
Does it happen every time you travel?

itchy_scalp.question: Do you notice dandruff or white flakes?
Does it worsen after using a specific shampoo?

hair_fall.question: Are you experiencing mild or heavy hair fall?
How long have you been losing hair?
Does hair fall increase after stress or travel?

gas.question: Do you feel bloating, burping, or stomach pressure?
Did you eat spicy, oily, or heavy food?
How long have you been feeling gassy?

sciatica.question: Is the pain in the lower back radiating to the legs?
How severe is the nerve pain?
How long have you had this pain?

chest_congestion.question: Are you experiencing thick mucus or heaviness in chest?

options.text: Thick mucus, hard to cough out

chest_congestion.question: Do you have cough along with congestion?
How long have you been feeling chest congestion?

breathlessness.question: Is the breathlessness mild or severe?
Does it occur during walking, resting, or climbing stairs?
How long have you been feeling breathless?

fatigue.question: Do you feel low energy throughout the day?
How long have you been feeling fatigued?
